#### Technical Specifications
Transport Canada is seeking a supplier to provide compliance testing services for vehicle lighting systems and retro-reflective devices, as per Canadian Standard 108. The contract will be awarded on a per-requirement basis, with an initial term of three years and two one-year extension options.
